chapters.title: Chapter 9: A Signal
chapters.info: Lini Eltring, p. 210 (150)—Childhood nurse to Maighdin, Morgase, and Elayne Trakand. She has many wise sayings, which Elayne and Morgase are fond of quoting to themselves and others (probably because they have been ingrained into their minds so much). See also Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Maighdin; Trakand, Morgase.
